title: Ma Po Tofu
description: Szechnan's famous dish, silken tofu with minced water chestnuts, onions, mushrooms in Chinese hot sauce.

title: Vegetarian's Paradise
description: Fresh vegetables stir-fried in white sauce or steamed.

title: Fried Tofu with Vegetables
description: Crispy fried silken tofu with fresh vegetables in brown sauce.

title: Stir-Fried Green Bean
description: Tossed with scallions in garlic soy sauce.
